description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. www.yyrgames.com - Hilarious, intense 4-player Battles! 100 challenging Missions and 3 Survival modes! You get it all with Snake Party, the ultimate evolution of Snake360!
